remarks: Permutation law for colinearity.  Part of theorem 4.11 of [Schwabhauser] p. 36.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Oct-2013.)
statement: colinearperm3 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( A Colinear <. B , C >. <-> B Colinear <. C , A >. ) ) $.
